## Microworld eScan

You can use the template below to send a respectable email that includes the data recommended by VirusTotal.

Mailto premade template -> [Send Email](mailto:samples@escanav.com?subject=False%20Positive%20Detection&body=Hi%20Microworld%20eScan%2C%0A%0AMy%20Program%20Is%20Falsely%20Detected%20With%20%22XXXXXXXXX%22%20in%20VirusTotal%2C%20can%20you%20please%20double%20check.%0A%0AVirusTotal%20link%3A%0AXXXXXXXXXX%0A%0ABest%20Regards%0AXXXXXXXXXX%0A%0A%5Bfalse-positive%20center%20github%5D)

#### Email Format
```
False Positive Detection
```
```
Hi Microworld eScan,

My Program Is Falsely Detected With "XXXXXXXXX" in VirusTotal, can you please double check.

VirusTotal link:
XXXXXXXXXX

Best Regards
XXXXXXXXXX

[false-positive center github]
```


**Data Is Inaccurate?** --> Please make a pull request and correct the information with the latest info.
